name: Film Empire
description:
Film Empire - the best and most unique film production simulator game! Join in to explore the vibrant film world through the immersiveness of a brilliant film adventure.

Design and create your very own Hollywood- production films based on your own intuition, then put your blockbuster film onto the film market (Box office) to earn you your long sought after acclaimed fame and wealth.

Take on the role of an ambitious producer - start from Mumbai and try to climb the leaderboards before moving to LA to do the same. Embark on a compelling and emotional journey to unravel the true meaning of becoming a successful Hollywood producer.
